name: The New Leader
description:
Young managers and supervisors want to become better leaders.

Unable to execute without unintended consequences, young leaders reluctantly make decisions. They want to deal with critical situations more confidently. 

The New Leader is a choose your own adventure game that allows young managers and supervisors to practice decision making in a safe environment. 

The game allows leaders to learn more about themselves and the impact of their decisions on the relationships that surround them.
